thread.title: great centre point for Town.
thread.title_full: great centre point for Town. - Review of Hilton London Angel Islington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Mike F
title: great centre point for Town.
text:
Very good, comfortable hotel, clean, friendly and quiet.
We used it as a starting point for a 4 day mini break in London and it was ideal.
Just one gripe. Why would they decide to clean out the Beer Pipes at 4.00pm on a Sunday!?. This may seem silly but if you've been out all day, are going out for a meal later and you can't have a pint in the hotel, how crazy is that. They could have done the pipes in the morning ..but no. 4.00pm was the time they chose.
Luckily Breakfast was still on in the morning, I was nervous about coming down and finding they had decided to sterilise all the pots and pans... whew!!.
